positions.title: Frontend Developer
positions.description:
Responsible for the development side of the company, from the phase of evaluating the project, developing it and managing it in front of the client. Working directly with the designers and giving a lot of attention to the project UX and UI.
My primary responsibility was to develop web and mobile platforms that look the same in all devices and browsers and are responsive and accessible.

given.text:
Yael Eliahoo worked with Amdocs innovations solutions lab on new dashboard web application for a strategic customer demo. As part of this project amdocs design department provided the baseline design for a new application while the web pages were developed by Yael using HTML5 and CSS3. Yael performed her tasks in a professional and accurate way. The end result looked exactly as designs and supported multiple screen resolution. It was my pleasure to work with Yael.
…
See more

Yael was working with us in our first steps of building 888casino webapp, supporting iOS and Android devices. Yael is a dedicated webmaster, that strive to the success of the project, always happy to assist, even beyond her role boundaries

Yael is very dedicated designer with a great personality which makes her a great person to work with. Yael can produce great products within tight deadlines, moreover she is also very open to new ideas, tools and technologies.

Yael is very creative and knows how to bring best performance just from the first sketch. she is quick and knows how to manage pressure and creative :-) one of the strong skills among creativity and very high quality performance is her nice and calm personality
